<<<<<<< HEAD
A nevve ballade intituled, Agaynst rebellious and false rumours To the nevve tune of the Blacke Almaine, vpon Scissillia. Newe ballade intituled, Agaynst rebellious and false rumours. Bette, Thomas.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
In Fletestreat at the signe of the Faucon by VVylliam Gryffith, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Sainct Dunstones Churchyarde, Imprinted at London : 1570.
Verse - What rumores now are raised of late". Signed: Thomas Bette. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
In Fletestreat at the signe of the Faucon by VVylliam Gryffith, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Sainct Dunstones Churchyarde, Imprinted at London : 1570.
Verse - What rumores now are raised of late". Signed: Thomas Bette. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
